data.eml:eml: Five new species of Buenoa (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Notonectidae) from Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Padilla-Gil, Dora N. (2010): Five new species of Buenoa (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Notonectidae) from Colombia. Zootaxa 2411: 22-32, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.293945
